## BinaryContent type

Represents the binary content of a Multimedia Component or a Template.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BinaryContent = {
    $type?: string;
    BlobId?: string;
    ExternalBinaryUri?: string;
    Filename?: string;
    IsExternal?: boolean;
    MimeType?: string;
    MultimediaType?: Link;
    Size?: number;
    UploadFromFile?: string;
    Url?: string;
};
```
